The father of the little girl depicted o: Denis Varela, confirmed that the girl and her mother were not separated and have been detained together.
The photographer: John Moore, took the photo of the girl crying next to her mother when they were detained by federal agents near the U.S.-Mexico border.
A correction was issued by Time magazine: S. Border Patrol agents; her mother picked her up, and the two were taken away together.
The Honduran deputy foreign minister: Nelly Jerez, confirmed the father's version of events to Reuters, further supporting the authenticity of the claim.
